text: Joseph R. Gannascoli (born February 15, 1959) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Vito Spatafore in the HBO series The Sopranos from 2000 to 2006. His movie credits include Money for Nothing (1993), Mickey Blue Eyes (1999), Men in Black 3 (2012) and An Act of War (2015). Gannascoli was born in Brooklyn, New York City. He married Diana Benincasa in 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Joseph R. Gannascoli
